comment: Did you really put 10 oz of cocoa nibs in this? I usually use about 2 oz to add subtle chocolate flavor. Was 10 oz really intense chocolate? Can you send me a bottle of this, would really like to try it? -Mason

Yep. 10 oz. The smoke intensity has subdued some but was pretty dominant. The large quantity of nibs helps round it out and its really not a chocolate bomb. Smoke is still up front.  Again, with my fruit/veg beer experience being limited. I needed more pumpkin.
